title: Once again, GD proves they do not know shit about PCs.
body:
This thread: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/GD/Ld261Iiz-apples-ceo-should-be-arrested-for-this?show=flat

>1.4GHz dual-core Intel Core i5
4GB memory
500GB hard drive1
Intel HD Graphics 5000
OS X Yosemite

>For 500 dollars, this is pretty much highway robbery.

Then I said it would be faster than an equivalently priced PC and got downvoted to hell.

Well take a look

Similar Intel NUC Barebones (No storage or RAM included) - $378
http://www.newegg.com/Product/Product.aspx?Item=N82E16856102035

The cheapest 500gb hard drive on Newegg would cost $50:
http://www.newegg.com/Product/Product.aspx?Item=N82E16822178125&cm_re=500gb-_-22-178-125-_-Product

What about the cheapest 4Gb of LPDDR3 ram? $37:
http://www.newegg.com/Product/Product.aspx?Item=N82E16820191394

Now lets compare the Mac's "Shit tier CPU":
http://www.cpu-world.com/Compare/859/Intel_Core_i5_Mobile_i5-3427U_vs_Intel_Core_i5_Mobile_i5-4260U.html

So you are paying $35 for a better CPU, a legal copy of Mac OSX Yosemite, and you will have it pre assembled.

GL paying an extra $80 on W7/8.1 :)

Get shit on virgins.
